abstract: A gray zombie baby chews on a severed human hand. A demonic toddler stares out with bright red eyes. Some parents say it's just too scary.
snippet: A gray zombie baby chews on a severed human hand. A demonic toddler stares out with bright red eyes. Some parents say it's just too scary.
lead_paragraph: A gray zombie baby chews on a severed human hand. A demonic toddler stares out with bright red eyes that in a horrifying twist, perfectly match the bows in her pigtails. A grandfatherly man with blood pouring from his mouth relaxes on a wooden chair, a pink teddy bear and a white-eyed, fang-baring baby resting in his lap.

headline.main: Chelsea Market Halloween Display Raises Hackles as Well as the Dead
